snippet.title: Forts Launch Date Teaser
snippet.description:
Forts is a physics-based RTS where foes design and build custom bases, arm them to the teeth and blast their opponent's creations to rubble. Add Forts to your Steam wishlist here - http://store.steampowered.com/app/410900/

Whether it's in the single-player campaign, or battling with up to 7 friends in the multiplayer, it's up to the player to construct ingenius forts from variety of materials, develop their tech tree and unlock a formidable arsenal with which to defend it. Featuring challenge mode, map editor, replay system and full mod support, Forts is coming to Windows via Steam on April 19th.

Visit us at http: //www.earthworkgames.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/earthworkgames

Twitter: https://twitter.com/EarthWorkGames

Tumblr: http://earthworkgames.tumblr.com.
